front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Learning Technology -- Metadata Encoding and Transmission Standard (METS) Mapping to the Conceptual Model for Resource Aggregation

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This recommended practice specifies how the elements and attributes defined in the Metadata Encoding and Transmission Standard (METS) relate to the components of the conceptual model for resource aggregation defined in IEEE Std 1484.13.1â„¢-2012.
